ing: DREYER'S SLOW CHURNEDÂ® Peppermint Ice Cream
Crushed candy canes or peppermint candies
des: "Direct from the North Pole and straight to your bowl. This holiday classic is sure to make your ice cream dreams come true."
ins:
In a sundae glass, layer, from the bottom up:
Chocolate or fudge sauce, DREYER'S SLOW CHURNED(R) Peppermint Ice Cream, crushed candy canes or peppermint candies, brownies.
